snippet.title: Reckless Racing 2 - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Strap down and prepare for the ride of your life... Reckless Racing is back with more! 

Including a selection of 18 highly detailed cars, ranging from small dirt buggies to fast supercars, and 24 routes in a variety of flavors make this a racer for all tastes -- both dirt and tarmac.

Race for credits in the new career mode and spend your earnings in the garage! Upgrade and tune your cars to match your driving style with a vast selection of parts. Whether you are a reckless power slider or a slick race driver, make your car the way YOU want it.

Releasing in early February for iPhone/iPad and Android devices!
